PaintBot: A smart paintbrush that uses AI to automatically blend colors and finishes, saving time and effort for artists.
ColorMix: A device that can mix and match colors from any image or design, allowing artists to create unique and vibrant palettes.
PaintPalette: A portable, wearable device that holds a variety of paint colors and can be customized to fit an artist's specific needs.
BrushBot: A robotic paintbrush that can be programmed to create custom brushstrokes and patterns, opening up new possibilities for artistic expression.
ColorCaster: A device that can transform any surface into a paintable canvas, allowing artists to create artwork on a wide range of surfaces and objects.
